resources.string: To give you the best possible experience, please tell us a little bit about yourself!
Fatburning workouts to help lose weight and tone muscle
Strength training to increase muscle mass
Cardio workouts to help you stay active for longer
Little to no prior workout experience. (You currently exercise 0 to 5 times a month)
Moderate prior workout experience. (You currently work out 6 to 12 times a month)
Significant workout experience. (You currently exercise 13+ times a month
We would like to know what workout equipment you have access to
Knowing what equipment you have access to will allow us to create workouts suited to what you have available. No gym membership required! There are many great workouts you can do right at home
Now all you need is a username for your character! This is the name that your friends in Fitness will identify you by, so choose wisely!
